title: Person of Interest - Season 3 Blooper??
author: LadyLlovesPOI
comment: Dear Lord did Sarah laugh that loud?! XD
He can walk on water, remember? Wouldn't have been that bad of a situation...
I love how Sarah just lost it XD

I honestly thought he was going to fall in the water and I was just waiting breathlessly for that moment. He didn't in the end but it was still funny as heck! And Sarah just sitting there laughing was total icing on the cake!
the whole time I was waiting for him to actually fall out xD
description: I originally wasn't going to post this vid as I was afraid of embarrassing Mr. C but since pics from the incident have been posted for awhile and as one of my BFFs SavhCaro said, "It's bound to make the blooper reel", I decided to go for it, I'm sure he's got a good sense of humor about the whole thing. Amazingly enough, JimCaviezelFan was standing right next to me (you can hear us both gasping at one point) and I never knew it was her! Talk about small world, hopefully she'll INTRODUCE HERSELF next time! ;) Anyway, enjoy.
